relationships.description: Dumbledore strokes Fawkes' head with one finger, causing the phoenix to awaken.
Harry watches Dumbledore over his shoulder.
Fawkes responds to Dumbledore's stroke by awakening and stretching.
Dumbledore gives a command to the phoenix, asking for a warning.
Fawkes is an instance of the mythical bird species known as a phoenix.
Dumbledore uses an instrument to create a warning.
